/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's daily hustle and bustle. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades painted in a palette of blue, gray, and brown, reflecting the urban landscape of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding a touch of serenity to the otherwise busy scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of looking up at the cityscape.
